alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Walker (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 21 at 7:09PM CDT until May 21 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN WALKER AND WEST CENTRAL JEFFERSON COUNTIES... At 709 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles south of Gorgas Steam Plant, or 12 miles northwest of Hueytown, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Cordova, Pleasant Grove, Adamsville, Graysville, Sylvan Springs, Mulga, Maytown, West Jefferson, Gorgas Steam Plant, Edgewater, Quinton, Gorgas, Forestdale, Minor, Concord, Goodsprings, Barney, Birmingport, Miller Steam Plant and Docena. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
